text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump As you said in February: “We will not see diseases like the coronavirus come here. And isn’t it refreshing when contrasting it with the awful presidency of President Obama?” @PressSec @realDonaldTrump @BarackObama #DonaldTrump #coronavirus #BarackObama
